# irec.sys ![:inline](/images/twitter_verified.png) 


### Description

irec.sys is a vulnerable driver and more information will be added as found.
- **UUID**: d74fdf19-b4b0-4ec2-9c29-4213b064138b
- **Created**: 2023-05-11
- **Author**: Nasreddine Bencherchali
- **Acknowledgement**: Michael Alfaro | [@_mmpte_software](https://twitter.com/@_mmpte_software)

{{< button "https://github.com/magicsword-io/LOLDrivers/raw/main/drivers/f1a203406a680cc7e4017844b129dcbf.bin" "Download" >}}
{{< tip "warning" >}}
This download link contains the vulnerable driver!

{{< /tip >}}
